name: Dodge (itch) (Sundown Interactive)
description:
Dodge is a game that is currently under development and will be updated everyday until full release the game currently has 3 levels and will have to new levels added everyday till we reach 50 in game levels.

The game is compatible with windows 10 and above.

The game is used by doging moving and non moving objects with your arrow keys, however you can also use the analog stick from your controller to perform the same actions as the arrow keys.
